alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Catoosa and northern Whitfield Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from Cohutta to near Ringgold to near Wood Station, and moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Ringgold, Varnell, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Beaumont, Wood Station and Rocky Face. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
